title: Players not getting punished for trolling team?

embed.description: Post with 0 views. team mate who trolls team never gets punished

body: HELP! I report players like this and it seems to do nothing... Why do trolls who hold teams hostage by refusing to play never seem to get punished? how do I go about reporting people and actually having it mean something?

replies.body: You're doing a good job by making sure you report them in the post game lobby! Sometimes players won't be actioned on immediately, but rest assured your reports help draw our attention to the accounts that need it.
Happens every day just forget about it.
